name: Cheddar Corner Cafe
description: Cozy cafe serving grilled cheese, tomato soup, and late-night study snacks.

name: Midnight Slice Pizza
description: Local pizza spot famous for giant slices and student discounts after 8 PM.

name: Bao & Brew
description: Asian fusion shop with steamed buns, boba, and chill lo-fi playlists.

name: Green Fork Salad Bar
description: Build-your-own salads, wraps, and smoothies for a slightly less chaotic diet.

name: Thread Theory
description: Minimal streetwear, graphic tees, and hoodies designed by local artists.

name: Locker Room Thrift
description: Thrift store with vintage jerseys, jackets, and accidentally fire outfits.

name: Campus Kicks
description: Sneaker boutique for limited drops, custom laces, and shoe cleaning.

name: Study Sweat Co.
description: Comfy sweats, socks, and beanies built for all-nighters and exam season.

name: Tech Rescue Repair
description: Phone and laptop repair that saves you when your screen cracks before finals.

name: Sparkle & Spin Laundry
description: Drop-off laundry and dry cleaning so you don't have to fight the dorm washers.

name: FocusRide Tutors
description: Peer tutoring for math, science, and SAT prep with flexible late-evening slots.

name: SnapShot Studio
description: Quick headshots, club photos, and content shoots for small businesses.

name: Level Up Arcade Lounge
description: Retro arcade, rhythm games, and comfy couches for group hangouts.

name: Starlight Mini Golf
description: Glow-in-the-dark mini golf with ridiculous obstacles and photo spots.

name: Reel Night Cinema
description: Small indie theater showing throwback movies, anime nights, and premieres.

name: Open Mic Hub
description: Coffee-shop stage for stand-up, poetry, and music from local performers.
